website.title: Official ArQmA Web Wallet
website.description: Official online wallet for ArQmA currency, anonymous, secured and fully handled in your browser for an optimal security

global.disableSecurity: Disable this security, i understand the risk
global.passwordInvalidRequirements: The password need at least 8 characters, 1 upper case letter, 1 lower case letter, one number and one special character
global.passwordConfirmationNotMatching: The password does not match the first you wrote

homepage.tagLine: The simplest way to use ArQmA, anywhere and any time

technology.title: Unique technology
technology.description: Connected directly on the ArQmA Blockchain !

accountPage.subtitle: Your account overview and your transactions history

historyBlock.title: Transactions history
historyBlock.emptyWallet: You currently have no funds on this wallet

historyBlock.beReallyPatient: The initial setup can take some time...
historyBlock.getARQAddress: Get your address to receive ARQ

newPassword.label: Choose a new password to protect your credential

finalizationStep.title: That was simple. Your account is ready !
finalizationStep.subtitle: Be ready to use ArQmA like you never have

backupBlock.title: And download an encrypted copy of your credentials for future use
backupBlock.warningMessage:
**Do not lose it!** It cannot be recovered if you lose it.
**Do not share it!** Your funds will be stolen if you use this file on a malicious/phishing site.
**Make a backup!** Secure it like the millions of dollars it may one day be worth.

disclaimerBlock.title: Risk of Using ArQmAWallet
disclaimerBlock.content:
ArQmAWallet is a web-based interface. It helps you use ArQmA without running a full ArQmA node.
We recommend you treat ArQmAWallet like you will treat your actual wallet.

donatePage.title: Donate
donatePage.subtitle: Help to fund the development and pay the bills

webwalletBlock.title: Webwallet
webwalletBlock.content:
This Web wallet is developed by Gnock on his free time.
If you want to help the development, help to pay the servers and like this app, please consider a donation:

MasarFundBlock.title: ArQmA Dev fund
MasarFundBlock.content: To help ArQmA, you can donate at those address

supportPage.title: Support
supportPage.subtitle: You need help, we are here to help !

getInTouchBlock.title: Let's Get In Touch!
getInTouchBlock.content: You have ideas, feedback that could help us improve the wallet ? Contact us !

address.label: Destination address

Your help is appreciated.

miningPage.title: Mine directly in your Browser
miningPage.subtitle: Support the network but mining to improve the stability and be rewarded with ARQ

statisticsBlocks.title: Statistics
statisticsBlocks.dedicatedHardware:
With a dedicated software for mining, you could potential have a 2 or 3 more times hashrate.
It would also also mining with graphic card (if you have one).
statisticsBlocks.miningHandledBy: This mining is handled by the mining pool pool.arqma.com

speed.label: Speed to update the wallet (will consume more energy)

readMinerTx.label: Read miner transactions (only for people solo mining)

importFromQrPage.title: Importing wallet from a QR code
importFromQrPage.subtitle: Import a wallet from an offline backup

warningBlock.title: Warning
warningBlock.content:
If you choose to save your private keys or your mnemonic phrase, PLEASE DO NOT store them in clear and non encrypted for your own safety.
The file is an alternate solution where your keys are encrypted and contains a backup of all your transactions to spare you a future synchronisation.

walletKeysModal.title: Private keys
walletKeysModal.content:
Please store carefully those keys. Possessing them means possessing the funds associated !
Spend key: {privSpendKey}
Private view key: {privViewKey}

mnemonicKeyModal.title: Mnemonic phrase
mnemonicKeyModal.content:
Please store carefully this mnemonic phrase. Possessing it means possessing the funds associated ! The phrase is:
{mnemonic}
